title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of hospitals, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Number of hospitals has decreased over the Year
Number of hospitals is slightly constant from 2007 to 2017.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Number of hospitals about 325.0 was recorded at Year 2007
Min Number of hospitals about 247.0 was recorded at Year 2017
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of hospitals, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2014.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
